sentence: The resort also does a great job of having pool activities for people to participate in and best of all the staff is not pushy in trying to get people to participate
You must take his water aerobics class everyday
By midnight there is not much activity anywhere except the casino
The Mile Spa is located near the Fitness Center but it does not have an ocean view either
Which always led to a late day pool volleyball game
We went riding twice did Hydrotherapy once and never had to worry about the scheduling conflicting with meal hours
We are young in our 30s enjoy a good time but we just like to pick choose what we want to do some activities there were so many over powering groups so we did n’t want to do them
Our weather was not great when we arrived but they always have an activity going on
We did not take part in any daytime activity or excursion as we just wanted to chill completely
I would say only half of the activities on the sheet provided actually happened

We were always left filling full and never hungry Private beach felt exclusive and relaxing We wanted an hour later check out which went smoothly with an Excellence Club perk Full bottle top shelf liquors was amazing again with Excellence Club perk Room service was fast and easySome not so great Our room AC was terrible so it made our clothes and sheets damped and humid Entertainment the shows felt repetitive after a few nights Activity options were limited there was a nice gym basketball court and tennis court but the bikes were only available during a certain period of time and the pool activities were also repetitiveOveral an amazing trip and highly recommended for first timers
I was simply amazed how he remembered my name every day as I passed by on my way to the gym
Melvi security Dorka Ana Driselda spa and Felix bar
Even a pond with natural wild life and tennis courts
The Fitness Center is very nicely equipped and the staff friendly and keep the facility spotless
The gym at this resort is the best that we have seen when comparing other Excellence and Sandals resorts
We enjoyed the hydrotherapy and massage from spa
Still here at the moment so will do a full review when we get back but wanted to take the chance to say how excellent the sports bar is with David Wilie and Ezna where fantastic
The massage and hydrotherapy was amazing and worth it wish we could ’ve got more massages but it was a bit pricy for massages
The other good news after all the good food and drink is the brilliant gym facility
